title: Dance in American Musical Theatre
description: Cultural norms portrayed through dance and musical production. Major works with multicultural, racial, class, and gender issues associated with American themes. Artists, role of dance in musical theatre, and significance of dance in human society. Purchase of concert ticket(s) may be required. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Theatre Arts majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C3
